kpi.name: M8006C188

kpi_info.title: Setup attempts for initial E-RABs of QCI1
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of setup attempts for initial E-RABs of QCI1. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is updated with the number of QCI1 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to Be Setup List" IE.

kpi.kpi_alias: Setup attempts for initial E-RABs of QCI1
